title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/CPU support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node & browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting & chat history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-hass-addon
summary: Home Assistant add-on to run Ollama locally for private voice/text automations.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (GPU & CPU) for easy server deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app backed by Ollama; useful starter template.

title: ollama-rag
summary: End-to-end RAG example with Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-nest
summary: Community Node.js NestJS module wrapping ollama-js for dependency injection.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Unofficial Dart/Flutter package to integrate Ollama in cross-platform apps.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Experimental Zig client for Ollama with HTTP streaming.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers via Ollama models with slash commands.
